meanings.sent1: The soft, warm sunlight on her skin was a sensed comfort.
meanings.sent2: The sweet fragrance of the flowers was sensed by everyone in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The cat's sensed curiosity led it to explore the mysterious box.
meanings.sent4: The sensed danger in the air made everyone uneasy.
meanings.sent5: The sensed presence of ghosts in the old house sent shivers down her spine.

meanings.sent1: The sensed danger in the dark alley made him turn back.
meanings.sent2: The familiar scent was sensed by the dog from afar.
meanings.sent3: The sensed surprise on his face was priceless.
meanings.sent4: The sensed tension in the room was palpable.
meanings.sent5: The sensed fear in her voice was evident to all.
